Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.server.controller.MenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class MenuController extends Object implements Controller
The MenuController class handles the preparation phase of the game. It is responsible for logging in players, setting the expected number of players for the game, and managing the lobby before the match starts. It also handles communication between the server and clients regarding the match start and player status. This class is a singleton and should only be instantiated once in the lifecycle of the game. It also manages the Ping/Pong requests to keep the connection alive or safely disconnect players

    • addHeartBeat

      public void addHeartBeat(ServerHearthBeat serverHearthBeat)
      Adds a heartbeat handler to the list of heartbeat handlers. This keeps track of the heartbeats for all active clients.
      Parameters:
      serverHearthBeat - the heartbeat handler to add.

      public boolean validateUsername(@NotNull @NotNull String username)

    • newMatchRequestHandler

      public void newMatchRequestHandler(@NotNull @NotNull NewMatchRequest newMatchRequest)

    • loginRequestHandler

      public void loginRequestHandler(@NotNull @NotNull LoginRequest loginRequest)
      Handles the login request of a player connecting to the server. If the match has already started, it sends a response indicating that the match has begun. If the username is taken, it sends a response indicating that the username is not available. If the player is the first to join, it prompts them to set the expected number of players.
      Parameters:
      loginRequest - the login request sent by the player.

    • pongRequestHandler

      public void pongRequestHandler(PongRequest pongRequest)
      Handles the PongRequest sent by the client in response to a PingRequest. Resets the heartbeat counter for the client when the PongResponse is received.
      Parameters:
      pongRequest - the PongRequest sent by the client.

    • pingRequestHandler

      public void pingRequestHandler(PingRequest pingRequest)
      Handles the PingRequest sent by the client to check the server's responsiveness. The server responds with a PongResponse to confirm the connection.
      Parameters:
      pingRequest - the PingRequest sent by the client.

    • disconnectClient

      public static void disconnectClient(int playerId)
      method used to disconnect a player
      Parameters:
      playerId - the client id to disconnect
